name: Historical Tweaks - Colonization
short_description:
Colonization submod for Historical Tweaks.
Portugal gets Brazil, Angola, Mozambique, the Azores, Madeira and Cape Verde.
Spain gets most of the Americas, the Philipines and the Canaries.
Britain gets Canada, the East Coast, Australia and wargoals on Dutch South Africa
France gets Quebec
France and Britain compete for Louisiana.
Muscovy/Russia get Siberia and Alaska.
Post-Yuan China gets Taiwan.
Unified Japan gets Hokaido.
The Netherlands get Indonesia, South Africa and wargoals on northeast Brazil.
Coastal Guinea is split between Portugal, France and Britain.
African inland colonization is blocked for countries with their capitals in Europe until they unlock Vaccinations.
